snippet: Judge Edward E. Chang of Federal District Court approved Chicago’s request for a six-month delay to allow the city time to come up with a new ordinance regulating gun sales.
abstract: Judge Edward E Chang of Federal District Court approves Chicago's request for six-month delay to allow city time to come up with new ordinance regulating gun sales.
lead_paragraph: Judge Edward E. Chang of Federal District Court approved Chicago’s request for a six-month delay to allow the city time to come up with a new ordinance regulating gun sales.

headline.main: Illinois: Chicago Is Granted More Time to Write Gun Law
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Chicago Is Granted More Time To Write Gun Law
